betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oWelcome to chapter 9!

§fOh Interesting!
While I cannot grow a Scared Cinders plant yet, the magic of the Tree of Life can reverse the seeds into fruits. 
See, all this tinkering paid off!
While the fruits are still far from a fill-fledged manifestation of this power, they still resonate with the recursive field of Sacred Cinders magic, and I can use them to track past and present uses of these power.
Xxeus made use of it quite proficiently, and in his nature as a protective inward-facing protectionism, much of its use involves hiding things.
Well, the term 'things' includes full planets. 
Yes, a secret planet! Hidden by the Shyre Empire behind both a Warren barrier, and a layer of Xxeus' powers.
A planet hiding something that my enemies were scared of, it seems. A power that could undo them.
